channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: GameStop CEO Ryan Cohen fuels speculation retailer will invest its $4.6 billion cash pile in Bitcoin
item.description: Reportedly the games retailer is considering whether to invest some of the cash in its war chest to buy BTC coins, which have soared following Trump's...

item.title: A Rafter ‘Swallowed’ by a Whale, and Caught on Dad’s Video
item.description: A humpback whale snatched and spat out Adrián Simancas, who had been packrafting with his father in the waters off Patagonia.

item.title: Zelenskyy says he believes Trump is the key to ending the Russia-Ukraine war—but mentioned it was ‘not very pleasant’ Trump spoke to Putin first
item.description: The Ukrainian president says he will only agree to meet in-person with Vladimir Putin after Trump negotiates a plan.

item.title: How the Justice Dept. Helped Sink Its Own Case Against Eric Adams
item.description: A top Trump appointee guided Mr. Adams’s legal team as they crafted an argument for dismissing corruption charges against the mayor of America’s large...

item.title: Trump’s Funding Freeze Raises a New Question: Is the Government’s Word Good?
item.description: Companies that get federal grants or loans usually sign a legally binding agreement and depend on getting reimbursed. The new administration has upend...

item.title: World leaders expected clarity on Trump’s peace plan for Ukraine. Instead, JD Vance scolded them on immigration and lectured them about censorship
item.description: “If you’re running in fear of your own voters there’s nothing America can do for you,” the vice president said.

item.title: Man Is Briefly ‘Swallowed’ by Whale in Chile
item.description: Paddling in the Strait of Magellan, Adrián Simancas was caught in a humpback’s lunge. “I realized that I was in something’s mouth and I had been eaten...

item.title: Elon Musk’s DOGE launched its website. It was hacked within days
item.description: “this is a joke of a .gov site”

item.title: Eric Adams Highlights Coordination With Trump’s Border Czar on Fox News
item.description: Mayor Eric Adams, appearing alongside the border czar, Tom Homan, said he would work with the Trump administration on immigration as he faces calls to...

item.title: The Ambani succession plan: Asia’s $90.5 billion dynasty lets three heirs carve their own paths
item.description: Nita Ambani says her three children are choosing the roles they take in Reliance Industries instead of being told by their parents.

item.title: Kendrick Lamar’s Halftime Show Was Political Art, if You Knew Where to Look
item.description: With an audience of over 120 million people, Kendrick’s show broke viewership records. But at times it seemed designed to speak directly to me.

item.title: Sexual Violence Against Children Soars in Congo, U.N. Group Says
item.description: UNICEF accused “armed men” of raping scores of children in the Democratic Republic of Congo, which has been ravaged by conflict recently.

item.title: Munich Car Attack: What We Know
item.description: At least 36 people were injured when an Afghan asylum seeker drove a car into a union march. The police said the driver confessed.

item.title: Live Updates: In Speech to Europeans, Vance Signals Support for Far-Right Parties
item.description: Vice President JD Vance scolded an audience in Munich, saying Europe was failing to uphold democratic values. He said nothing about President Trump’s ...

item.title: Sexual Violence Against Children Soars in Congo, U.N. Group Says
item.description: UNICEF accused “armed men” of raping scores of children in the Democratic Republic of Congo, which has been ravaged by conflict recently.
